topic.para: For untrusted certificates only the existence of the certificate is checked, but it does not have to be valid — syslog-ng accepts the certificate even if it is expired, signed by an unknown CA, or its CN and the name of the machine mismatches.

warning.para: When validating a certificate, the entire certificate chain must be valid, including the CA certificate. If any certificate of the chain is invalid, &abbrev; will reject the connection.
